## getFieldMatcher() function

### getFieldMatcher() function

Resolves a field matcher from the registry for given config. Will throw an error if matcher can not be resolved.

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare function getFieldMatcher(config: MatcherConfig): FieldMatcher;
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { getFieldMatcher } from '@grafana/data';
```
<b>Parameters</b>

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | <code>MatcherConfig</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`FieldMatcher`
